post.content:
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
This is an excellent opportunity to join the CGI Group in Ottawa in providing leading IS/IT services to our broad client base.

Role
Oracle DBA at the intermediate to senior level, ability to interface professionally with client, team player.

Responsibilities
-Coding/testing/optimization of SQL executable object (procedures, functions, packages, triggers, etc.)
-Installation, upgrades and daily maintenance of the database servers
-Change Management and Configuration Management/Version Control experience
-Reverse engineering and database documentation skills
-Maintain and monitor a set of standard database processes to ensure the regular database tasks are properly executed
-Carry out performance tuning
-Implement and monitor database security
-Perform database backup and recovery
-Participate or lead in the database capacity planning and the server upgrade process
-Work with database vendors to resolve database related issues

The successful candidate must possess a minimum of 3 to 5 years experience with hands on Oracle Database Administration and Development with 8.1.7 or higher background. Must be extremely motivated, well-organized, and resourceful.

Strong communication skills, high comfort level dealing with clients and understanding of the client/service provider relationship are important. Oracle Certification would be an asset.

CGI is the fourth largest independent information technology services firm in North America providing end-to-end IT services and business solutions to more than 3,000 clients worldwide. CGI provides a full range of IT services, including consulting, systems integration and the management of business and IT functions.

This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for this position start on the date of hire and include minimum 3 weeks vacation, potential profit sharing and a stock purchase plan. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position; however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

No unsolicited agency referrals please.


Must Have Skills

Working knowledge of Oracle Database Administration and development (Oracle 8.1.7 or later).
Working knowledge of Oracle Database Administration in an Oracle / Java Code environment.
Nice to Have Skills
Data modeling knowledge.
Hands on working knowledge of Shell scripting.
Knowledge of Power Builder, Power J and/or ASA database standard.
Government experience.
